about_the_game:
R&D Labs is a game mode for TerraTech, which allows the player to take on a variety of unique challenges and test out a series of experimental items.

The Labs include all items from the main game, unlocked for unlimited building, and are split into a number of different features, including:

  • Battle Arena, Target Practice & Turret Run
  • Races, Time Trials & Stunt Ramps
  • DPS Target, Weigh Station & Speed Trap
  • Grassland, Desert, Mountain and Exotic Biome Zones
detailed_description:
R&D Labs is a game mode for TerraTech, which allows the player to take on a variety of unique challenges and test out a series of experimental items.

The Labs include all items from the main game, unlocked for unlimited building, and are split into a number of different features, including:

  • Battle Arena, Target Practice & Turret Run
  • Races, Time Trials & Stunt Ramps
  • DPS Target, Weigh Station & Speed Trap
  • Grassland, Desert, Mountain and Exotic Biome Zones

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher
  • Processor: 2.33Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3 Compatible GPU with 1GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Two-button mouse strongly recommended. Spec may be subject to revisions during Early Access.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Snow Leopard
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM3 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Two-button mouse strongly recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Snow Leopard
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM4 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Two-button mouse strongly recommended

name: TerraTech: R&D Labs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM3 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM4 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: R&D Labs is a game mode for TerraTech, which allows the player to take on a variety of unique challenges and test out a series of experimental items.
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Dutch, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese
